solution_line_template: Each car has {car_tires} tires + {spare_tire} spare = <<{car_tires}+{spare_tire}={tires_per_car}>>{tires_per_car} tires

If there are {num_cars} cars in the parking lot and each one has {tires_per_car} tires, then the total number of tires is {num_cars} * {tires_per_car} = <<{num_cars}*{tires_per_car}={total_tires}>>{total_tires} tires
